mapper.select: SELECT qu.qr_code, qu.group_id, qg.group_name, qu.is_domain_admin, qu.is_admin, CASE WHEN gp.max_uploads = qu.upload_count THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS is_upload, CASE WHEN gp.max_votes = qu.vote_count THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS is_vote FROM qr_user qu INNER JOIN qr_group qg ON qu.group_id = qg.group_id INNER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT ON (qg.group_id) qg.group_id, qg.group_name, gp.max_uploads, gp.max_votes, gp.voting_start, gp.voting_end, gp.upload_start, gp.upload_end FROM qr_group qg INNER JOIN group_policy gp ON qg.group_id = gp.group_id ORDER BY qg.group_id, gp.policy_version DESC ) gp ON qu.group_id = gp.group_id WHERE qr_code = #{qrCode} AND qg.group_name = #{groupName}

SELECT qu.qr_code, ( SELECT group_id FROM qr_group WHERE group_name = #{groupName} ) AS group_id, qu.group_id AS admin_group_id, qg.group_name, qu.is_domain_admin, qu.is_admin, CASE WHEN gp.max_uploads = qu.upload_count THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS is_upload, CASE WHEN gp.max_votes = qu.vote_count THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS is_vote FROM qr_user qu INNER JOIN qr_group qg ON qu.group_id = qg.group_id INNER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT ON (qg.group_id) qg.group_id, qg.group_name, gp.max_uploads, gp.max_votes, gp.voting_start, gp.voting_end, gp.upload_start, gp.upload_end FROM qr_group qg INNER JOIN group_policy gp ON qg.group_id = gp.group_id ORDER BY qg.group_id, gp.policy_version DESC ) gp ON qu.group_id = gp.group_id WHERE qu.qr_code = #{qrCode} AND qg.group_name = 'admin'

update.foreach:
UPDATE qr_user
upload_count = upload_count + 1
vote_count = vote_count + 1
upload_count = GREATEST(upload_count - 1, 0)
vote_count = GREATEST(vote_count - 1, 0)
WHERE qr_code = #{user.qrCode} AND group_id = #{user.groupId}
